info.description:
Trick or Trick?!

Tonight’s Halloween, and it’s time for some fun, except you forgot to get any candies! But the real question is… For whom will it be a fun night?!

Mark: He’s 19 years old, has a blond hair and is 5’8’’. Currently, he is having the year off after his high school. He’s living with his girlfriend Victoria, who he met at in their high school, in a one bedroom house. He doesn’t know much about his neighbours as he only barely greeted them few times.
